name: HiveQuest--EAE Playtest Demo
description:
Install instructions

The first loading screen (after the controls screen) can take a hot second to load. If you clicked the button to continue the game, you're fine, just wait for a moment!

Controls:
WASD and Arrow Keys -- move left/right and jump
Space Bar/Z -- Interact with dialogue
Esc -- Pause menu
Left Mouse -- choose options for in-battle sequences
